posts.post_content:
SOLD: 2 1880's Baseball Team Cabinets. There are a total of 10 players in the picture. Some of the gentlemen seem to be much older, so this doesn't look like a high school team. Could possibly be a college team or club team? Visible in the picture are baseball bats, baseball caps, and gloves. They are wearing thick quilted pants, with period equipment showing.

The cabinet measures 5 1/4" (w) by 4 1/4" (h).

Price: SOLD

If interested please email me: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Payment accepted: Check, MO, Paypal (no additional fees)

*****Or would be willing to trade for T or E cards.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/FCVCI/1880sBaseballTeamCabinet1myscans.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/FCVCI/1880sBaseballTeamCabinet2myscans.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/FCVCI/1880sBaseballTeamCabinet3.jpg[/IMG]
what kind of t and e cards are you looking for?

posts.post_title: Bump for a big price drop
posts.post_content:
Price cut in half.

Now $25 a  piece or take both for $45.

Bargain time!
